txt.en: Derufin can be found in Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Derufin.
Langarch can be found somewhere in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should defeat Langarch.
'Well done. Well done indeed! No need to tell the Rangers. I shall inform Anborn myself. You've done much. It is the least I can do! Take care, friend.'
The bounty notice reads:\n\n'A large boar keeps interfering with Ranger activities. Please speak with me for further details. Derufin'
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Derufin who has information about Langarch, a maddened wild beast in Southern Ithilien.

You ask Derufin about the bounty notice.\n\n'The bounty! I am quite glad you are here! The Rangers asked if Duilin and I could rid them of this nuisance. Apparently this boar's been getting in the way of the Rangers slinking about. Obviously I said yes to appease these hospitable men. The thing is, we're quite busy with hunting bigger game and can't be bothered with this animal. If you take care of this task for me, Duilin and I would be most grateful.'
Derufin can be found in Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Derufin.
